title: Pixel 4 not booting after march update
content:
My pixel 4 became a brick after the update!
Did the update, pressed restart, the phone shutdown and now does not respond to nothing!
Full black screen, and does not turn on!
Tried holding power for long time, power + vol down, with and without the charger connected, and got nothing! :(
Anyone had the same problem?
Any tips to try to bring it back to life?
Thanks
